#!/bin/bash
# Tell frontend to send you the 411 shared key /opt/rocks/bin/get-411-key 10.1.1.1
# Wait 120 seconds for shared key to get populated for i in {1..12}; do [ ! -f /etc/411-security/shared.key ] && sleep 10s done
# If shared key got transferred, do a 411get and pull information # from frontend
[ -f /etc/411-security/shared.key ] && /opt/rocks/bin/411get --all
if [ -f /etc/rc3.d/S*autofs || -f /etc/rc5.d/S*autofs ]; then /sbin/service autofs restart fi
[ -f /etc/411-security/shared.key ] && rm -rf /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-03-411get
